learning_outcomes: Identify famous places and sightseeing objects
Understand and give simple travel advice using imperatives

content.prompt_es: ¿Es correcto decir 'Buying a souvenir' como una instrucción?

content.stimulus_en: ________ (no) drink the water in the park.

content.prompt_es: Pregunta por el inicio del tour:
Tourist: 'Excuse me, is the museum open today?' - Staff:

options.text: Yes, it is. It opens at 10 AM.
No, it is closed on Mondays.

content.stimulus_en:
A: Can I take photos here?
B: No, ________. (no saque fotos)

content.prompt_es: A map helps you find places in a city.

content.stimulus_en: Anna buys a souvenir before she leaves the city. She visits a small shop. The shop has many colorful souvenirs. Anna likes a red mug. It has a picture of the city on it. She pays for the mug and smiles. Now, she has a gift to remember her trip.

content.prompt_es: Escucha y escribe lo que oyes:
content.stimulus_en: Take a map of the city.
content.correct_answer: Take a map of the city.

content.title: Pronunciación: Guide
content.instructions: Escucha y repite la vocal larga.

content.title: Pronunciación: Camera
content.instructions: Escucha y repite la palabra de tres sílabas.

questions.prompt_es: ¿Cuántas sílabas sueles oír en la pronunciación rápida de 'camera'?
¿La 't' final en 'ticket' es sonora o sorda?

options.text: Sorda (sin vibración de las cuerdas vocales)
